title: Officer drove at 93mph in police chase before fatal crash
description: Dr Keryl Johnson, 35, died in hospital 11 days after the crash in Bristol city centre.
content:
A police officer reached speeds of 93mph (149km/h) as he pursued a motorist in the run-up to a fatal crash, a jury has heard.

title: In 1972, An Apollo 16 Astronaut Left a Set of Personal Objects on the Moon for a Surprising Reason!
description: In 1972, an Apollo 16 astronaut left a family photo on the Moon, a surprising and personal memento that still sparks curiosity today.

title: Nearly 100 trees blown down at St Michael's Mount due to Storm Goretti
description: The historic site has lost around 80 percent of its trees
content:
Pictures show the extensive damage caused to historic tidal island St Michael's Mount after Storm Goretti - with nearly 100 trees blown down.
The heavy storm brought chaos to Cornwall, prompting a rare red weather warning for wind.

description: Audi ran its 2026 F1 car for the first time at Barcelona on Friday. Here's what we have learned so far
content:
